page.title: 14HOUSING-OLD PEOPLE'S HOME'S
page.content: The old people's home's were built in 1969 there are nine of them. There are two bedrooms, one kitchen, one frontroom they have no gardens but outside of the kitchen window there is a small lawn.They have a bell just incase they need help.They also have a person who goes round and see's if they are alright.The name of the person who goes around the bungalows is Mrs Jones.Mrs Jones lives in a row of four houses ,she lives in the end one, the number is twenty eight.The old people have got no garages,But use the local bus service to go to town. If they become too infirm they are transferred to Llwyn Teg Old Peoples Home Llanfyllin.
